content: That's really helpful! I think I'll start by cleaning my silver earrings and necklace with a silver polishing cloth to remove any tarnish. I'll also make sure to store them separately to prevent scratching or tangling. Do you have any advice on how to style my vintage brooches and pendants that I inherited from my grandmother? I've been wanting to wear them more often, but I'm not sure how to incorporate them into my outfits.
